title: Ain't No Queen
description: In Ain’t No Angel, Vivi stole Hoyt’s heart and became the alpha of an all-male half-breed demon pack. That was the easy part.As the mating frenzy begins, Vivi tries to create alliances with powerful female warriors and secure a safe haven for her pack. She also plans for a life with her cranky statue. When a rogue wizard in the Syndicate chooses Vivi as his mate, Hoyt is tormented by disturbing dreams and becomes convinced he will destroy Vivi.With time running out, Vivi must battle to save her pack, win back the male she loves, and embrace the power hidden inside her.Note: Ain’t No Alpha, book #3 in the Vivi Rios series, will be published in early 2014.
author: Angela Horn
